attributes.action: Scrap age limits on having Tattoos and Body Piercings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap legal ages of tattoing and body piercing. You have to be 16 to have kids, once you've had your kids at 16 you'd be unable to have tattoo in their honour. This is stupid because a child is much more of a responsibility than a tattoo.
